attributes.action: Bring about a motion of no confidence against Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details: To make sure that the elected government is answerable to the electorate and the party in office.
attributes.background: To make Boris Johnson realize the seriousness of his laissez faire attitude towards his position as Prime Minister and that it is unacceptable that an unelected aid is able to control a democratically elected government.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.  

You might like to sign this petition calling for a public inquiry into the handling of coronavirus:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302576
